name: 黃聲東
objective: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、生物化學知識及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
schedule:
Weeks　　Content
1　　Organic Chemistry Brief reviews 
2　　Holiday No Classes
3　　Organic Chemistry and Biochemistry Brief reviews
4　　Biochemistry Brief Review
5　　War against bacteria; Total synthesis of Penicillin V
6　　Total Synthesis of Penicillin V
7　　Application of ��-Lactamse Protein
8　　EXAM 1
9　　Biochemistry of Steroid and biosynthesis
10　　Total Synthesis of Progestrone
11　　Total Synthesis of Estrone
12　　Bio-organic chemistry of the anticancer drug mechanism
13　　EXAM 2
14　　Total Synthesis of Dynemicin A
15　　Total Synthesis of Dynemicin A
16　　Holiday No Classes
17　　Total Synthesis of Dynemicin A
18　　EXAM 3
